tossup_question: 11) CHEMISTRY  In which of the following reversible gas reactions does the value of Kp = Kc (read as: K sub P equal K sub C):
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) A + B ↔ C (read as: A plus B, double arrow, yields C)
X) 2A + B ↔ C + D
Y) A + B ↔ C + D
Z) A ↔ B + C
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Y) A + B ↔ C + D
bonus_question: 11) CHEMISTRY  How many milliliters of 0.1 molar hydrochloric acid are required to neutralize 50 milliliters of a 0.1 molar strontium hydroxide solution?
bonus_answer: ANSWER: 100 (Solution: (0.05L)(0.1mol/L) = 0.005 M Sr(OH)2 × 2HCl/1Sr(OH)2 = 0.01 mol HCl; 0.01 mol HCl × L/0.1 mol = 0.100L = 100ml)
